analyzed: ahantvāt tu bhavet prītiḥ na sā kāmaiḥ kathañcana
sa kalmaṣā kaṭu phalā duḥkhāt kāma udbhavā ratiḥ

original: yā tu kāmavinirmuktā sā ratiḥ pari(bhāṣitā) // Dhs_7.44 //
analyzed: yā tu kāma vinirmuktā sā ratiḥ paribhāṣitā
yoginaḥ paramā gatiḥ

original: tāṃ samāśritya gacchanti yoginaḥ paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: tām samāśritya gacchanti yoginaḥ paramām gatim

original: na tu kāmakṛtā prītirnayate padamacyutam // Dhs_7.45 //
analyzed: na tu kāma kṛtā prītiḥ nayate padam acyutam
kāma jaratim nindati
āpāta madhurā ramyā vipāke jvalana upamā
ratiḥ bhavati kāma agni janyā naraka gāminī

original: āpātaramyā madhurā madhye ramyā ca sarvadā /
analyzed: āpāta ramyā madhurā madhye ramyā ca sarvadā

original: śāntamante ca vimalaṃ nayate padamacyutam // Dhs_7.47 //
analyzed: śāntam ante ca vimalam nayate padam acyutam
ādi anta madhya kalyāṇī nityam mātā iva śobhanā

original: tāṃ vyudasya kathaṃ bālā rakṣante (kāmajāṃ ratim) // Dhs_7.48 //
analyzed: tām vyudasya katham bālāḥ rakṣante kāma jām ratim
kāma kṛtā ratiḥ niratam tapati
madhya ādi nidhane duḥkhā nityam doṣa ādibhiḥ vṛtā

original: kathaṃ sā sevyate bālairyā na dṛṣṭā sukhāvahā // Dhs_7.49 //
analyzed: katham sā sevyate bālaiḥ yā na dṛṣṭā sukha āvahā
viṣamañjari vat ramyā sparśe jvalana sambhavā

original: tathā kāmakṛtā prītiḥ pariṇāme viṣopamā // Dhs_7.50 //
analyzed: tathā kāma kṛtā prītiḥ pariṇāme viṣa upamā
hūyamānaḥ yathā vahniḥ jvalanena praśāmyati

original: dāhena ca prarohaḥ syāt tadvat kāmakṛtā ratiḥ // Dhs_7.51 //
analyzed: dāhena ca prarohaḥ syāt tadvat kāma kṛtā ratiḥ

original: pataṅgaḥ paśyati hyagni dāhadoṣaṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: pataṅgaḥ paśyati hi agni dāha doṣam na paśyati
tathā kāma kṛtām prītim paśyanti akṛtabuddhayaḥ

original: yastu rāgakṛto dāhaḥ pacyate kāmināṃ sadā /
analyzed: yaḥ tu rāga kṛtaḥ dāhaḥ pacyate kāminām sadā

original: pataṅgasadṛśaṃ dāhaṃ sarvathā nai(va) paśyati // Dhs_7.53 //
analyzed: pataṅga sadṛśam dāham sarvathā nā eva paśyati
kāma pramādāt patanam dhruvam eva
tasmāt kāma viṣam
tyaktvā nityam jīvatha he surāḥ

original: bhavantu mā vṛthā janmapramādena prapātanam // Dhs_7.54 //
analyzed: bhavantu mā vṛthā janma pramādena prapātanam
saṃkṣīṇa śubha karmāṇaḥ nityam kāmaiḥ vimohitāḥ

original: taṃ hitvā narakaṃ yānti kāmamohena vañcitāḥ // Dhs_7.55 //
analyzed: tam hitvā narakam yānti kāma mohena vañcitāḥ
kāma mohitaḥ viṣa vṛkṣa mayam puṣpam pibati
viṣa vṛkṣa mayam puṣpam pīyate bhramaraiḥ yathā

original: tathā viṣātmakamidaṃ sukhaṃ bhuṅkte hi mohitaḥ // Dhs_7.56 //
analyzed: tathā viṣa ātmakam idam sukham bhuṅkte hi mohitaḥ

original: jīveyuḥ pāmarāḥ kecit viṣaṃ pītvāpi durbhagāḥ /
analyzed: jīveyuḥ pāmarāḥ kecid viṣam pītvā api durbhagāḥ

original: na kāmaviṣapītasya jīvitaṃ durlabhaṃ bhavet // Dhs_7.57 //
analyzed: na kāma viṣa pītasya jīvitam durlabham bhavet
yathā hi narake vahniḥ jvalayati a vicāriṇam
tathā kāma mayaḥ vahniḥ dahati iha divaukasaḥ
kāmāgniḥ hiṃsakaḥ eva
śruti pāśa mayaḥ vahniḥ pretān eṣa dahati ati
dahane hiṃsakaḥ vahniḥ nṛṇām paryeṣaṇa ātmakaḥ
evam agni samam tāvat parihārya samantataḥ
sarva lokam aśeṣeṇa dahyate kāma mohitaḥ
viṣaya āsaktam manaḥ vyasane pātayati
viṣayeṣu sadā acittam dhāvantam cañcalam mahat

original: na tyājyaṃ vyasane mūḍha yad paśyasi bhaviṣyati // Dhs_7.61 //
analyzed: na tyājyam vyasane mūḍha yat paśyasi bhaviṣyati
kāmeṣu rakṣa te cittam vyasanena avabudhyate

original: vyasanaughe samutpanne tat paścāt paritapyate // Dhs_7.62 //
analyzed: vyasana oghe samutpanne tat paścāt paritapyate
kāma mohitāḥ mahat bhayam api na paśyanti
vṛthā kāma madaiḥ mattāḥ devāḥ prakṛti durbalāḥ

original: bhramanti bhramitāḥ kāmairna paśyanti mahad bhayam // Dhs_7.63 //
analyzed: bhramanti bhramitāḥ kāmaiḥ na paśyanti mahat bhayam
viśvasanti hi ye devāḥ kāmeṣu ahita kāriṣu
vyatirekeṣu te paścāt pratibudhyanti amedhasaḥ
kāmāḥ parama vañcakāḥ bhavanti
na ca paśyanti vi
budhāḥ cittena parivañcitāḥ

original: kṣaṇikā madhurā jātāḥ kāmāḥ paramavañcakāḥ // Dhs_7.65 //
analyzed: kṣaṇikāḥ madhurāḥ jātāḥ kāmāḥ parama vañcakāḥ
kāma prati na viśvaset
śataśas ca sahastraiḥ ca koṭiśas padmaśas tathā

original: labdhā naṣṭā punaḥ kāmā na teṣāṃ viścaset pumān // Dhs_7.66 //
analyzed: labdhā naṣṭā punar kāmāḥ na teṣām viścaset pumān
kāmaiḥ mohitaḥ pataṅga samaḥ naraka agninā dahyate
viṣayāt bandhanam tīvram sarve naraka hetavaḥ
tasmāt atyantataḥ tyaktvā śreyase kriyatām manaḥ

original: rāgeṇa rañjitāḥ pūrvaṃ dveṣeṇa ca tiraskṛtāḥ /
analyzed: rāgeṇa rañjitāḥ pūrvam dveṣeṇa ca tiraskṛtāḥ
mohena mohitāḥ ca eva te śruta akṛta kāriṇaḥ
kāma arthaiḥ eṣyate bālaḥ punar kāmaiḥ vimohitaḥ

original: sa pataṅgasamo mūḍhaḥ dahyate narakāgninā // Dhs_7.69 //
analyzed: sa pataṅga samaḥ mūḍhaḥ dahyate naraka agninā
kāma vaśa gāḥ sura lokāt api patanti
avaśyambhāvi patanam sura lokāt samantataḥ

original: na jñātvā kāmavaśago syādiha kathañcana // Dhs_7.70 //
analyzed: na jñātvā kāma vaśagaḥ syāt iha kathañcana

original: kāmena vañcitāḥ sattvāḥ kāmena ca vimohitāḥ /
analyzed: kāmena vañcitāḥ sattvāḥ kāmena ca vimohitāḥ
kāma pāśa apakṛṣṭāḥ te patanti narake sadā
kāmam tyaktvā sva hite manaḥ karttavyam

original: tadetad vyasanaṃ sattvāḥ svahite kriyatāṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: tat etat vyasanam sattvāḥ sva hite kriyatām manaḥ
manasā api sva dāntena na anutapyanti dehinaḥ
manaḥ viṣeṇa ye daṣṭāḥ kāma vegena sarvadā

original: te mūḍhā mṛtyuvaśagāḥ kāmānalahatā narāḥ // Dhs_7.73 //
analyzed: te mūḍhāḥ mṛtyu vaśa gāḥ kāma anala hatāḥ narāḥ
na tṛptiḥ asti kāmānām tṛṣṇayā hita kāriṇām

original: tṛṣṇāpi tṛptijanikā mano naiva hi tṛpyati // Dhs_7.74 //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā api tṛpti janikā manaḥ nā eva hi tṛpyati
jñāna dīpena eja indriyāṇām viṣayebhyaḥ tṛptiḥ jāyate
na jātu viṣayaiḥ tṛptiḥ indriyāṇām bhaviṣyati

original: yadi na jñānadīpena kṣapayiṣyanti (te narāḥ) // Dhs_7.75 //
analyzed: yadi na jñāna dīpena kṣapayiṣyanti te narāḥ
nārī sevanena nāśaḥ su niścitaḥ
yoṣitaḥ sevyamānāḥ hi vitarka śata mālikāḥ
pravardhati yathā vahniḥ vāyunā samudīritaḥ
kāma agni dīptāḥ kadāpi śāntim na āpnuvanti
tam matvā vega rabhasā nityam kāmaḥ agni dīpitaḥ
kāmān hāpayati jñānī buddha tattva vicintakaḥ
ye nityam bhrānta manasaḥ nityam viṣaya tatparāḥ

original: ramante vibudhāḥ sarve tat sarvaṃ mohaceṣṭitam // Dhs_7.78 //
analyzed: ramante vibudhāḥ sarve tat sarvam moha ceṣṭitam
sevyamānaḥ hi vibudhaiḥ viṣaya agniḥ vivardhate
pāśena anena saṃyuktaḥ vahniḥ vāyu samīritaḥ
rāga vivaśāḥ amarāḥ api patanti
amarāḥ rāga vivaśāḥ nityam viṣaya tatparāḥ
deva lokāt patanti ete moha rāgeṇa vañcitāḥ
ramante viṣayaiḥ ete tatra tad līna mānasāḥ

original: na ca vindanti yad duḥkhaṃ viprayogo bhaviṣyati // Dhs_7.81 //
analyzed: na ca vindanti yat duḥkham viprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati
viyoga jam duḥkham kaṣṭa pradam eva
yat etat sukham eva ādau divyam pañca guṇa anvitam
viyoga jasya duḥkhasya kalām na arhati ṣoḍaśīm
kāmānām tad vighātaḥ hi janena evā upayujyate

original: satṛṣṇasya tathā tṛptiḥ kāmebhyo naiva jāyate // Dhs_7.83 //
analyzed: sa tṛṣṇasya tathā tṛptiḥ kāmebhyaḥ nā eva jāyate
kāma anusevinaḥ duḥkham kadāpi śāntim na adhigacchati
an apekṣita cittasya nityam kāma anusevinaḥ
dīrgha rātra ānuśayikam duḥkham na eva praśāmyate
tvaritam rakṣyate mūḍhaḥ vyasanena eva budhyate

original: paścāttu vyasane prāpte jānīte yasya tat phalam // Dhs_7.85 //
analyzed: paścāt tu vyasane prāpte jānīte yasya tat phalam
āsvāda bhadrakāḥ hi ete kāmāḥ parama dāruṇāḥ
dūtakān narakasya etān caranti ahita kāriṇaḥ
viṣaya agni dagdhāḥ narakam yānti
yaḥ teṣām viśvaset martyaḥ jñāna cakṣuḥ vigarhitaḥ

original: viṣayāgnirabhratulyaḥ sa yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // Dhs_7.87 //
analyzed: viṣaya agniḥ abhra tulyaḥ sa yāti narakam naraḥ
alpa āsvāda alpa hṛdayāḥ nityam puruṣa vañcakāḥ
gandharvanagara prakhyāḥ kāmāḥ āsvāda bhadrakāḥ
viṣaya mohitāḥ devāḥ api durgati yānti
yathā dīpa prabhā bhasma
sañchannā iva punar punar

original: na ca bindatyamanaso devā viṣayamohitāḥ // Dhs_7.89 //
analyzed: na ca bindati amanasaḥ devāḥ viṣaya mohitāḥ
viṣayeṇa ati rabhasāḥ nityam kāma vaśa anugāḥ

original: na vidanti mahad duḥkhaṃ yadavaśyaṃ bhaviṣyati // Dhs_7.90 //
analyzed: na vidanti mahat duḥkham yat avaśyam bhaviṣyati
ramaṇīyāni kāmāni yasya evam jāyate matiḥ

original: sa paścād vyasane prāpte mūḍho 'sau vipralapyate // Dhs_7.91 //
analyzed: sa paścāt vyasane prāpte mūḍhaḥ sau vipralapyate
na kāmena mada andhasya viṣayaiḥ mohitasya ca
naityikam bhavati śarmma yat sukhānām anuttamam
ādhyātmika sukha apekṣayā kāma sukham hīnatamam

original: yacca kāmasukhaṃ loke yacca tṛṣṇodbhavaṃ sukham /
analyzed: yat ca kāma sukham loke yat ca tṛṣṇā udbhavam sukham
ekasya ādhyātmikasya idam kalām na arhati ṣoḍaśīm
kāmī kadāpi sukham na aśnute

original: na sukhī vartate tāvadya yasya kāmo hṛdi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: na sukhī vartate tāvat adya yasya kāmaḥ hṛdi sthitaḥ
sa sarva duḥkha bhāga arhaḥ narakān upadhāvati
na tṛptiḥ vidyate kāmaiḥ api bhogaḥ
śatam nṛṇām

original: yatra saukhyaṃ na tatrāsti tṛptirviṣayasevinām // Dhs_7.95 //
analyzed: yatra saukhyam na tatra asti tṛptiḥ viṣaya sevinām

original: sevyamānāḥ sadā kāmā vardhante ca muhurmuhuḥ /
analyzed: sevyamānāḥ sadā kāmāḥ vardhante ca muhur muhur

original: te vardhitā viṣasamā bhavanti vinipātinaḥ // Dhs_7.96 //
analyzed: te vardhitāḥ viṣa samāḥ bhavanti vinipātinaḥ
vipatti kuśalāḥ ghorāḥ nityam patana hetavaḥ

original: na ca teṣāṃ parityāgaṃ kurvanti viṣayotsavāḥ // Dhs_7.97 //
analyzed: na ca teṣām parityāgam kurvanti viṣaya utsavāḥ
yasya dṛṣṭi samudrasya rūpaiḥ tṛptiḥ na vidyate
tathā śarma manojñaiḥ ca rasa tṛptiḥ na vidyate
gandhaiḥ api sadā ghrāṇam na tṛptim adhigacchati

original: sparśāḥ sammukhasaṃsparśāḥ sevyante naiva tṛpyate // Dhs_7.99 //
analyzed: sparśāḥ sammukha saṃsparśāḥ sevyante na eva tṛpyate

original: śabdaiḥ kāntaiḥ sumadhuraiḥ śrotrameti na tarpaṇam /
analyzed: śabdaiḥ kāntaiḥ sumadhuraiḥ śrotram eti na tarpaṇam

original: mano 'pi tṛptiviśvastaṃ vardhamānaṃ na tṛpyati // Dhs_7.100 //
analyzed: manaḥ pi tṛpti viśvastam vardhamānam na tṛpyati
indriyāṇi kāma bhūmiṣu pātayanti
ṣaḍ indriyāṇi capalāni ādhṛtāni ratau punar
bhramanti muṣitāḥ nityam kāma bhūmiṣu anekaśas

original: na tṛptirasti devānāṃ gajānāṃ vai tṛṇairyathā /
analyzed: na tṛptiḥ asti devānām gajānām vai tṛṇaiḥ yathā

original: analasya svabhāvo 'yaṃ tasya tṛptirna vidyate // Dhs_7.102 //
analyzed: analasya svabhāvaḥ yam tasya tṛptiḥ na vidyate
ṣaṭ ete vahnayaḥ tīvrāḥ vitarka anila mūrchitāḥ
bhramanti muṣitāḥ nityam kāma bhūmiṣu anekaśas
indriya dagdhāḥ narakam yānti

original: tairayaṃ dahyate loko na ca vindatyabuddhimān /
analyzed: taiḥ ayam dahyate lokaḥ na ca vindati abuddhimān

original: āsvādabhadrakā hayete narakasya ca hetavaḥ // Dhs_7.104 //
analyzed: āsvāda bhadrakāḥ narakasya ca hetavaḥ
kāma mohitaḥ sukha vañcitaḥ bhavati
kāmāḥ viṣaya lobhāḥ te lelihānāḥ yathā uragāḥ

original: vilocanavaro hayeṣa na ca kāmairvimohitaḥ // Dhs_7.105 //
analyzed: vilocana varaḥ na ca kāmaiḥ vimohitaḥ
kāma vaśīnaraḥ netra hīnā mūḍhataraḥ
sukha anusāriṇaḥ kāmaḥ narakān upadhāvati

original: na netrahīno narake pātyate satkriyānvitaḥ // Dhs_7.106 //
analyzed: na netra hīnaḥ narake pātyate satkriyā anvitaḥ

original: tasmād varaṃ vicakṣuḥ syānna tu kāmavaśo naraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt varam vicakṣuḥ syāt na tu kāma vaśaḥ naraḥ
aśakya vañcitāḥ mūḍhāḥ kāmaiḥ ahita kāribhiḥ
kāma cāriṇām jñāna ādikam durlabham
anirvidyanti kāmebhyaḥ mohitāḥ svena cetasā

original: na jñānaṃ nāpi vijñānaṃ vidyate kāmacāriṇām // Dhs_7.108 //
analyzed: na jñānam na api vijñānam vidyate kāma cāriṇām
kāmaḥ mṛtyu bhavanam nayati
yat duḥkha kāma jam hatvā punar kāma vaśa anugāḥ
ca ye kāmāḥ kimpāka phala sannibhāḥ

original: nayanti mṛtyubhavanaṃ durgatīśca punaḥ punaḥ // Dhs_7.109 //
analyzed: nayanti mṛtyu bhavanam durgatīḥ ca punar punar
a nivarttya yathā toyam āpagānām anekaśas

original: tathā saukhyagataṃ nṛṇāṃ sarvathā na vivartate // Dhs_7.110 //
analyzed: tathā saukhya gatam nṛṇām sarvathā na vivartate
vana upavana bhogeṣu sukha prāpteṣu anekaśas

original: yo na tṛpyati kāmeṣu sa naro 'dhamagāmikaḥ // Dhs_7.111 //
analyzed: yaḥ na tṛpyati kāmeṣu sa naraḥ dhama gāmikaḥ
pramādaḥ upahataḥ jantuḥ kāma āsvādeṣu tatparaḥ

original: rūpeṣu rakṣyate nityaṃ pariṇāme ca vidyate // Dhs_7.112 //
analyzed: rūpeṣu rakṣyate nityam pariṇāme ca vidyate
ghana chāyā svarūpāṇi karma miśrāṇi yāni vai

original: tāni caiva kathaṃ devāḥ śakṣyante kāmagocare // Dhs_7.113 //
analyzed: tāni ca eva katham devāḥ śakṣyante kāma gocare
kāmāḥ kadāpi na sevyāḥ

original: yadi nityā bhaveyurna kāmāste syurviṣopamāḥ // Dhs_7.114 //
analyzed: yadi nityāḥ bhaveyuḥ na kāmāḥ te syuḥ viṣa upamāḥ

original: tathāpi kāmatṛṣṇā yā na sā jāti vilakṣaṇā /
analyzed: tathā api kāma tṛṣṇā yā na sā vilakṣaṇā

original: prāgeva nityaṃ duḥkhāya śūnyamātmānameva ca // Dhs_7.115 //
analyzed: prāk eva nityam duḥkhāya śūnyam ātmānam eva ca
teṣu duḥkha vipākeṣu katham rakṣanti abuddhayaḥ
kāma āsvādeṣu rakṣyante bāliśāḥ manda buddhayaḥ
ādīnavam na buddhayante kimpāka phala sannibham
rūpa śabda ādi baddhaḥ yam tṛṣṇā viprakṛtaḥ janaḥ
dīpyate vivaśaḥ nityam
ku karma phala mohitam
āsvādayitvā puruṣāḥ kāmān viṣa phala upamān

original: tṛṣṇayā tṛptamanasaḥ patanti narake punaḥ // Dhs_7.118 //
analyzed: tṛṣṇayā tṛpta manasaḥ patanti narake punar
yathā abhivarṣate toyam vardhante saritaḥ yathā
tathā kāma abhivarṣeṇa devānām vardhate nalaḥ
kāma sukhasya na antaḥ vidyate
dṛśyate tṛṣṇayā āturaḥ

original: evaṃ sukhābhivṛddhā ca na vitṛpyati devatā // Dhs_7.120 //
analyzed: evam sukha abhivṛddhā ca na vitṛpyati devatā

original: ākāśasya yathā nānto vidyate nāpi saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśasya yathā na antaḥ vidyate na api saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ kāmeṣu nāstyantaḥ kāmināṃ nāsti saṃkṣayaḥ // Dhs_7.121 //
analyzed: evam kāmeṣu na asti antaḥ kāminām na asti saṃkṣayaḥ
salila ādibhiḥ atṛptasya sāgarasya ūrmi mālinaḥ

original: na tu kāmairatṛptasya tṛptirasti kathañcana // Dhs_7.122 //
analyzed: na tu kāmaiḥ atṛptasya tṛptiḥ asti kathañcana
aprāptaiḥ viṣayaiḥ devāḥ na vitṛpyanti bāliśāḥ
viṣayaiḥ nā eva tṛpyanti sukha lālasa tatparāḥ
kāmaḥ tāpāya
na tu śāntyai
saṃprāpte vyasane tīvre cyavamāne api anekaśas

original: tapyate viṣaye tasmāt paraṃ kāmo na śakyate // Dhs_7.124 //
analyzed: tapyate viṣaye tasmāt param kāmaḥ na śakyate
vilokya puruṣān ete kāma viśvāsa ghātinaḥ

original: tyajanti vyasane prāptā vipadyante hi te narāḥ // Dhs_7.125 //

sattvam pāruṣya paramam ghoram narakam āgatam
jihvā āyātam tava ākṛtyai kim adya paridevase
sahastra guṇa paryantaḥ svatas hṛdaya sambhavaḥ
kṣudh pipāsā āmayaḥ vahniḥ samādahati mārutam
paruṣa vācaḥ narakasya ca antaram
yat antaram hima agnyoḥ hi meru sarṣapayoḥ ca yat

original: tadantaraṃ jihvayoktyā narake jvalanasya ca // Dhs_16.114 //
analyzed: tad antaram jihvayā uktyā narake jvalanasya ca
naraka prabhavaḥ vahniḥ na kvāpi anyatra prāpyate
kṣudh pipāsā āmayaḥ vahniḥ deveṣu api upalabhyate
yaḥ hi atas kāraṇāt tīkṣṇaḥ vahniḥ bhavati nārakaḥ

original: na tathā sa prabhavati yathā vahnistadudbhavaḥ // Dhs_16.116 //
analyzed: na tathā sa prabhavati yathā vahniḥ tad udbhavaḥ
pūrva uttarā baddha padam nirarthakam asaṅga tam
vistrabdha yat tvayā proktam tasya etat phalam āgatam

original: pareṣāṃ sampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama syāditi cintitam /
analyzed: pareṣām sampadam dṛṣṭvā mama syāt iti cintitam
tamaḥ bhikhyā samutthasya viṣasya phalam āgatam
vyāpāra anala dagdhaḥ si mānuṣyam puruṣa adhama

original: dahanād dahanaṃ prāpto tapyase ca vikatthyase // Dhs_16.119 //
analyzed: dahanāt dahanam prāpto tapyase ca vikatthyase
vyāpāra para mohe tu naraka āya upapattaye
rajjvā etayā eva baddhaḥ si puruṣaḥ parikrandase
vyāpādena ākṛṣṭaḥ si ghoram narakam āgataḥ
karma kṣayāt bhavet mokṣaḥ narakāt ca vimokṣyase
adharma kathanam dahati eva
adharmaḥ dharma rūpeṇa sādhu rūpeṇa pāpakam

original: yat tvayā kathitaṃ pūrva tat tvāṃ dahati nānalaḥ // Dhs_16.122 //
analyzed: yat tvayā kathitam pūrva tat tvām dahati na analaḥ
katham tattva vinaṣṭānām dharma adharma nicchatām

original: deśitaṃ vivaraṃ pāpaṃ niyataṃ pāpagāmikam // Dhs_16.123 //
analyzed: deśitam vivaram pāpam niyatam pāpa gāmikam
yaḥ tvayā varjitaḥ dharmaḥ sādhavaḥ ca api ninditāḥ
yat tvayā upārjitam kṛṣṭam tat tvayā adya vipacyate
tṛṣṇā viṣaya yuktena moha vegena sarvadā

original: yataḥ sadharmavinayaiḥ kiṃ tathā paridevase // Dhs_16.125 //
analyzed: yatas sadharma vinayaiḥ kim tathā paridevase
sa bhavet pāpa kṛt nityam moha pāśa vaśaṅgataḥ

original: ki tapyase rodiṣi ca karma kṛtvā sudāruṇam // Dhs_16.126 //
analyzed: ki tapyase rodiṣi ca karma kṛtvā su dāruṇam
hetu pratyaya mūḍhasya dharma adharmeṣu sarvadā

original: prāpto 'si narakaṃ ghoraṃ nārakāgraṃ sudāruṇam // Dhs_16.127 //
analyzed: prāptaḥ si narakam ghoram nāraka agram su dāruṇam
kāma vaśa anugāḥ narakam yānti
kāmaiḥ kramati saṃyuktaiḥ yat na bhavati ceṣṭitam
su kṛtam karma virasam phalam etat upasthitam
kṣapayitvā pramādena sukha āsaktena cetasā

original: sukṛta narakaṃ yānti devāḥ kāmavaśānugāḥ // Dhs_16.129 //
analyzed: sukṛta narakam yānti devāḥ kāma vaśa anugāḥ
ārya apavādakāḥ narakam yānti

original: āryāpavādakā ye ca ye ca karmaphaladviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ārya apavādakāḥ ye ca ye ca karma phala dviṣaḥ

original: te mṛtvā narakaṃ yānti ye ca mithyāvinītakāḥ // Dhs_16.130 //
analyzed: te mṛtvā narakam yānti ye ca mithyā vinītakāḥ
dharma vañcakāḥ eva naraka gāminaḥ
jananīgṛha pāpīyāḥ ye ca anye dharma vañcakāḥ

original: teṣāmiṣṭakarā loke narakasya ca gāminaḥ // Dhs_16.131 //
analyzed: teṣām iṣṭa karāḥ loke narakasya ca gāminaḥ
pāpa ratāḥ duḥkham anubhavanti

original: ye cānye sukhasaṃsaktā nityaṃ pāparatā narāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca anye sukha saṃsaktāḥ nityam pāpa ratāḥ narāḥ

original: duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ tu te yānti cittena parivañcitāḥ // Dhs_16.132 //
analyzed: duḥkhāt duḥkham tu te yānti cittena parivañcitāḥ
avadya kāryāṇi narake pātayanti

atas kuśala karmāṇi karttavyāni
karmāṇi kuryāt kuśalāni nityam parārtha baddhena manorathena
hitaḥ sadā evam narakasya rodhī
sevyaḥ pavargaḥ daśa dharmaḥ eṣaḥ
iti naraka vargaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ
preta vargaḥ
adānasya kutas sukham
adāntasya kutas śāntiḥ anuptasya kutas phalam

original: adīpikā prabhā nāsti adānasya kutaḥ sukham // Dhs_17.1 //
analyzed: adīpikā prabhā na asti adānasya kutas sukham
hṛd śāntiḥ hi tathā nā asti nayana arthasya dehinaḥ

original: dānena virahāt tadvat sukhaṃ pretairna labhyate // Dhs_17.2 //
analyzed: dānena virahāt tadvat sukham pretaiḥ na labhyate
ku karmī preta lokam gacchati

original: yaṃ pretya pretalokasya triloke ca yathādhamāḥ /
analyzed: yam pretya preta lokasya triloke ca yathā adhamāḥ
bhrameṇa parama udvignāḥ tad mātsarya kṛtam phalam

original: na dātrā labhyate kiñcit kṛtanāśo na vidyate /
analyzed: na dātrā labhyate kiñcid kṛta nāśaḥ na vidyate
sva karma phala bhoktāraḥ prāṇinaḥ karma bhoginaḥ
tava yat kukṛtam dagdhāḥ pretya lokeṣu avasthitāḥ
kṣudh pipāsā āmayena iha vahninā paridīpitāḥ
kadā tu smākam bhaviṣyati sukha udayaḥ

original: paridāhāt kadā cāsmāt parimokṣo bhaviṣyati // Dhs_17.6 //
analyzed: paridāhāt kadā ca asmāt parimokṣaḥ bhaviṣyati
mārga amārga vihīnaḥ duḥkhitaḥ eva jīvati

kṣudh pipāsā āmayaḥ vahniḥ ajñātaḥ prakaṭa udayaḥ
kleśa andhakāra vadanāḥ nirāśāḥ tyakta jīvikāḥ

original: tvaksnāyujālabaddhāḥ sma jīvāmo bata duḥkhitāḥ // Dhs_17.8 //
analyzed: tvak snāyu jāla baddhāḥ sma jīvāmaḥ bata duḥkhitāḥ

original: na trātā sarvato 'smākaṃ hanta kṛcchragatā vayam /
analyzed: na trātā sarvatas smākam hanta kṛcchra gatāḥ vayam

original: utpanneṣu manuṣyeṣu khaṇḍitāḥ svena karmaṇā // Dhs_17.9 //
analyzed: utpanneṣu manuṣyeṣu khaṇḍitāḥ svena karmaṇā

original: yaḥ karoti śubhaṃ nityamaśubhaṃ na ca sarvadā // Dhs_17.10 //
analyzed: yaḥ karoti śubham nityam aśubham na ca sarvadā

original: yeṣāmarthe kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kleśayan mānasaṃ bahu // Dhs_17.11 //
analyzed: yeṣām arthe kṛtam pāpam kleśayat mānasam bahu

original: anena te gatāḥ sarve bhavānāṃ trāsane sthitaḥ /
analyzed: anena te gatāḥ sarve bhavānām trāsane sthitaḥ
baddhaḥ si bandhanaiḥ tīvraiḥ yama dattaiḥ adhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: ihopabhokṣyase karma yattvayā kukṛtaṃ kṛtam // Dhs_17.13 //
analyzed: iha upabhokṣyase karma yat tvayā kukṛtam kṛtam
svakṛtam bhujyate bāla
pareṣām na eva bhujyate

na agni śastra viṣāṇām hi nipātaḥ tādṛśaḥ kaṭuḥ

original: na kṣaṇo nāpi hi lavo na muhūrto na śarvarī // Dhs_17.16 //

duḥkha anvitāḥ vayam
yatra saukhyam bhavet mṛtyuḥ nityam duḥkha āvṛtāḥ vayam

duḥkhāt kadācid mokṣaḥ syāt bhaviṣyati sukha udayaḥ

original: notsave dṛśyate toyaṃ taḍāgeṣu ca śuṣyati // Dhs_17.18 //
analyzed: na utsave dṛśyate toyam taḍāgeṣu ca śuṣyati

original: na dārāḥ nāpi mitrāṇi na putrāḥ nāpi bāndhavāḥ // Dhs_17.31 //
analyzed: na dārāḥ na api mitrāṇi na putrāḥ na api bāndhavāḥ

krodha īrṣyā mati saṃgrastāḥ tiryagyoni upagāḥ narāḥ
paryeṣṭi upahatāḥ martyāḥ pramāda upahatāḥ surāḥ

original: kṣuttarṣavyasanāḥ pretāḥ kāraṇātte ca nārakāḥ // Dhs_18.5 //
analyzed: kṣudh tarṣa vyasanāḥ pretāḥ kāraṇāt te ca nārakāḥ

analyzed: dīrgha āgamasya yat duḥkham na tat varṇayitum kṣamam

dharma avabodha abhirataḥ dhyāna ārāma vihāravān
tattva lakṣaṇa sambodhāt prāpnuyāt padam avyayam
maitrī ārāmaḥ hi satatam udyuktaḥ dharma gocare
tattva lakṣaṇa tattva jñaḥ bhikṣuḥ bhavati tādṛśaḥ
yoniśas tu matiḥ yasya kāma krodhaiḥ na hanyate
sa bhikṣuḥ iti vijñeyaḥ viparītaḥ tatas nyathā
sarva bhūta dṛḍhaḥ śāntaḥ sarva saṅgati varjitaḥ

original: nirmalaḥ syāt kanakavat santuṣṭo bhikṣurucyate // Dhs_30.73 //
analyzed: nirmalaḥ syāt kanaka vat santuṣṭaḥ bhikṣuḥ ucyate

original: na pānabhojanarataḥ sa bhikṣuḥ śāntamānasaḥ // Dhs_30.76 //

original: hitakārī ca sattvānām āraṇyo bhikṣurucyate // Dhs_30.85 //
analyzed: hita kārī ca sattvānām āraṇyaḥ bhikṣuḥ ucyate

original: tat kiñcit sāsravaṃ saukhyaṃ tat sarva kṣaṇikaṃ matam /
analyzed: tat kiñcid sa āsravam saukhyam tat kṣaṇikam matam

original: rāgabandhād vinirmuktaṃ tat sarva niścalaṃ sukham // Dhs_33.39 //
analyzed: rāga bandhāt vinirmuktam tat sarva niścalam sukham

original: ye na kṣipanti duḥkhena sukhe yeṣāṃ na saṅgatiḥ /
analyzed: ye na kṣipanti duḥkhena sukhe yeṣām na saṅgatiḥ
te duḥkha sukha nirmuktāḥ nirvāṇa sukha gāminaḥ

original: anupāyena ye mūḍhāḥ prārthayanti sukhaṃ sadā /
analyzed: anupāyena ye mūḍhāḥ prārthayanti sukham sadā

original: bālukābhiryathā tailaṃ yallabhyaṃ nityameva tat // Dhs_33.41 //
analyzed: vālukābhiḥ yathā tailam yat labhyam nityam eva tat
na cetasā naraḥ prājñaḥ manoratha śataiḥ api

original: śakro 'pi tat sukhaṃ kartu yathā karma kṛtaṃ mahat // Dhs_33.42 //
analyzed: śakraḥ u pi tat sukham kartu yathā karma kṛtam mahat
sukhāya dharmam ācaret

original: sasukhaṃ yasya tu manaḥ saddharmānucaro bhavet /
analyzed: sa sukham yasya tu manaḥ saddharma anucaraḥ bhavet

original: duḥkhairmuktyabhilāṣo 'yaṃ sa dharme kurute matim // Dhs_33.43 //
analyzed: duḥkhaiḥ mukti abhilāṣaḥ yam sa dharme kurute matim

original: nāhetukaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā trividhātmakam /
analyzed: na ahetukam sukham dṛṣṭam duḥkham vā trividha ātmakam

original: sukhe duḥkhe pṛthagbhāve tasmānnu sukṛta caret // Dhs_33.44 //
analyzed: sukhe duḥkhe pṛthagbhāve tasmāt nu sukṛta caret

original: nedaṃ saukhyaṃ sadā śastamadhruvaṃ vipralopi ca /
analyzed: na idam saukhyam sadā śastam adhruvam vipralopi ca
tṛṣṇā viṣeṇa sammiśram viṣa miśram yathā odanam
tat saukhyam hi
satām śastam yatra mṛtyuḥ na vidyate

original: na ca priyeṇa viśleṣo nāpriyeṇa samāgamaḥ // Dhs_33.46 //
analyzed: na ca priyeṇa viśleṣaḥ na apriyeṇa samāgamaḥ
kīdṛśam sukham duḥkha janakam
yat etat strī mayam saukhyam etat duḥkhāya kalpyate
tad bīja vartakāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ narakeṣu upapattaye

original: yat sukhaṃ duḥkhajanakaṃ kathaṃ tat sukhamiṣyate?
analyzed: yat sukham duḥkha janakam katham tat sukham iṣyate

original: duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ jñeyaṃ pariṇāmavaśena tat // Dhs_33.48 //
analyzed: duḥkhāt duḥkhataram jñeyam pariṇāma vaśena tat
yat etat bhujyate saukhyam etat kālena naśyati
raśmayaḥ saha cāriṇaḥ
vikṛtim yasya ca
manaḥ sukha duḥkhaiḥ na gacchati

original: sa dhīmān suraloke ca gatvānyallabhate sukham // Dhs_33.50 //
analyzed: sa dhīmān sura loke ca gatvā anyat labhate sukham

original: bhuktaṃ sukhaṃ purāṇaṃ tu hīnakarma karoti ca /
analyzed: bhuktam sukham purāṇam tu hīna karma karoti ca

original: purāṇaṃ sukṛtaṃ śīrṇa mṛtyukāle na budhyate // Dhs_33.51 //
analyzed: purāṇam sukṛtam śīrṇa mṛtyu kāle na budhyate
sarva sukham anityam bhavati
yat idam dṛśyate saukhyam manaḥ vāc kāma jam bhṛśam
anityam tat vināśa tvam acireṇa bhaviṣyati
phena budbuda saṅkāśam marīci udaka sannibham

original: cañcalormi sukhaṃ sarva vinipāto bhavārṇave // Dhs_33.53 //
analyzed: cañcala ūrmi sukham vinipātaḥ bhava arṇave
cakra vāta pravegaḥ vai
mṛtyu rājā eṣa dhāvati

original: nāśayitvā sukhaṃ sarva nāśayitvā ca jīvitam /
analyzed: nāśayitvā sukham sarva nāśayitvā ca jīvitam
karma saṅkalpa vāhyeṣu lokam anyatra neṣyati

original: yadatīva sukhaṃ nṛṇāṃ taddhi saukhyāya kalpyate /
analyzed: yat atīva sukham nṛṇām tat hi saukhyāya kalpyate

original: yannaiṣyati sukhaṃ kiñcit taddhi naiva vigaṇyate // Dhs_33.56 //
analyzed: yat na eṣyati sukham kiñcid tat hi nā eva vigaṇyate
vartamānam tu yat saukhyam tṛṣṇā viṣa vivarjitam

original: sarva hyanātmajaṃ duḥkhamanityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ balam // Dhs_33.57 //
analyzed: duḥkham anityam saṃskṛtam balam
laukikam sukham na sukham

original: yad sukhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu na śastaṃ tattvadarśibhiḥ /
analyzed: yat sukham triṣu lokeṣu na śastam tattva darśibhiḥ

original: tena matvā kathaṃ devā bhavanti vigatajvarāḥ? // Dhs_33.58 //
analyzed: tena matvā katham devāḥ bhavanti vigata jvarāḥ
yam bhairavaḥ yāti sattvaram

original: yo bhokṣyate surān sarvān śuṣkendhanamivānalaḥ // Dhs_33.59 //
analyzed: yaḥ bhokṣyate surān sarvān śuṣka indhanam iva analaḥ

original: atiyāti sukhaṃ sarva kriyatāṃ śraiyasaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: atiyāti sukham sarva kriyatām śraiyasam manaḥ

original: mā paścāt saṃbhavo yoge mṛtyukālo bhaviṣyati // Dhs_33.60 //
analyzed: mā paścāt saṃbhavaḥ yoge mṛtyu kālaḥ bhaviṣyati
sukham asthiram bhavati
janma antara sahasreṣu yat muktam karma jam sukham
taraṅga sannibhaḥ kva ayam jānīyāt
bāliśaḥ sthiram
kaḥ sukhena prasīdati
na sukhaiḥ tṛpyate bālaḥ tathā kāṣṭhaiḥ yathā analaḥ
tasmāt na sukha
saktasya sukham bhavati naiṣṭhikam
viṣasya doṣa muktasya kāma doṣa anudarśinaḥ
dhyāyinaḥ ca apramatasya tat sukham yat anāvilam

original: sukhī bhavati tat prāpya na sukhaṃ bhavajanmanaḥ /
analyzed: sukhī bhavati tat prāpya na sukham bhava janmanaḥ
bandha miśram viṣam yadvat dharma saukhya udayaḥ tathā
kāma virahitaḥ sukham aśnuvate
tasmāt tad sukha saktānām nityam kāma gaveṣiṇām
bhavanti aneka saukhyāni
tasmāt kāmaḥ na jāyate
jñānena eva indriyāṇi sva gocare nivartante
na indriyāṇām jayaḥ śakyaḥ karttu viṣaya gocare

original: jñānena hi nivartante indriyāṇi svagocare // Dhs_33.66 //
analyzed: jñānena hi nivartante indriyāṇi svagocare
bālāḥ eva gati pañcake bhramanti
duḥkhe sukha abhisaṃsaktāḥ nityam bālāḥ hayamedhasaḥ
viparyayā paribhrāntāḥ bhramanti gati pañcake
kutra sukham duḥkha sadṛśam bhavati
yat atyanta sukham dṛṣṭam tat sukham satyam ucyate

original: yatra duḥkhaṃ vipākaṃ syāt tat sukhaṃ duḥkhameva tat // Dhs_33.68 //
analyzed: yatra duḥkham vipākam syāt tat sukham duḥkham eva tat
pāpasya akaraṇam eva sukham
anya āgatasya duḥkhasya pratighātayate budhaḥ

original: pāpasya hetujaṃ duḥkhaṃ pāpasyākaraṇaṃ sukham // Dhs_33.69 //
analyzed: pāpasya hetu jam duḥkham pāpasya akaraṇam sukham
iti sukha vargaḥ trayastriṃśaḥ
mitra vargaḥ
kaḥ pāpāt nivārayati
tat mitram mitram iti uktam yat mitram sāmparāyikam

original: nivartayati yaḥ pāpād vyasanāccāpi rakṣati // Dhs_34.1 //
analyzed: nivartayati yaḥ pāpāt vyasanāt ca api rakṣati
praveśayati yat nityam tat hitam sāmparāyikam

original: mitraṃ bhavati tannṛṇāṃ na mitraṃ pāpakārakam // Dhs_34.2 //
analyzed: mitram bhavati tat nṛṇām na mitram pāpa kārakam
saṃsarga jāḥ doṣa guṇāḥ bhavanti
apūtiḥ pūti saṃśleṣāt pūtiḥ eva upajāyate
na pūtiḥ pūta saṃśleṣam a pūtim karttum arhati
yādṛśena hi
saṃśleṣam kurute puruṣaḥ sadā

original: taddoṣāt sadṛśo dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ // Dhs_34.4 //
analyzed: tad doṣāt sadṛśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śubhaḥ vā yadi vā aśubhaḥ
na śubham duḥkha kārakam
śubha arthī puruṣaḥ sarvān aśubhān na eva sevate

original: tenāsau duḥkhamāpnoti na śubhaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam // Dhs_34.5 //
analyzed: tena asau duḥkham āpnoti na śubham duḥkha kāraṇam
guṇa doṣayoḥ lakṣaṇam
saṃśleṣa jāḥ guṇāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ doṣāḥ saṃśleṣa jātayaḥ
lakṣaṇam guṇa doṣāṇām idam uktam svabhāva jam

original: yaśasā yujyate yo hi nityaṃ sādhusamāgamāt /
analyzed: yaśasā yujyate yaḥ hi nityam sādhu samāgamāt
asādhu saṅgamāt śrīghram prayāti puruṣa adhamaḥ
sat saṅgati phalam
etat sāram sadā kārya yat asādhu vivarjanam

original: sādhubhiśca sadā vāso duṣṭāṇāṃ ca vivarjanam // Dhs_34.8 //
analyzed: sādhubhiḥ ca sadā vāsaḥ duṣṭāṇām ca vivarjanam
doṣān samuddharet dhīmān guṇa vṛddhim samācaret
sādhu mitram prakurvīta kausīdya vimukhaḥ bhavet

original: na māninaṃ kusīdaṃ vā nityaṃ sarvānuśaṅkinam /
analyzed: na māninam kusīdam vā nityam sarva anuśaṅkinam
lipta pāpam ati krūram mitram kuryāt na paṇḍitaḥ
udyuktam mṛdu jātīyam dharmiṣṭham doṣa varjitam
samyak dṛṣṭiḥ acapalam mitram seveta paṇḍitaḥ
na pāpakam bhavet mitram bhavet uttama pauruṣaḥ

original: uttamaṃ bhajamānasya na doṣebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet // Dhs_34.12 //
analyzed: uttamam bhajamānasya na doṣebhyaḥ bhayam bhavet
kaḥ laghu tām yāti
rūpa aiśvarya kula ādīni bhidyante yasya dehinaḥ

original: bhayapradaṃ taṃ mātaṅgaḥ prayāntaṃ naiva paśyati // Dhs_34.13 //
analyzed: bhaya pradam tam mātaṅgaḥ prayāntam na eva paśyati
udvṛttaḥ puruṣaḥ nityam pramāda ākulita indriyaḥ

original: laghutāṃ yāti loke 'smin pretyapāpeṣu pacyate // Dhs_34.14 //
analyzed: laghu tām yāti loke smin pretya pāpeṣu pacyate
rūpa aiśvarya mada arthāḥ ye te narāḥ pāpa kāriṇaḥ
teṣām na su śamam karma
pretya pāpeṣu pacyate

original: rūpaiśvaryakulārthā ye na te tattvasya bhāginaḥ /
analyzed: rūpa aiśvarya kula arthāḥ ye na te tattvasya bhāginaḥ

original: atattvabuddhayo bālā na taranti bhavārṇavam // Dhs_34.16 //
analyzed: atattva buddhayaḥ bālāḥ na taranti bhava arṇavam
jñāna śīla ādi yutam kulam śreṣṭham
etat kulam ye vibhavāḥ yat ca anyat sukham iṣyate
sarvāṇi etāni anityāni tasmāt teṣu na viśramet
na jñāna śīla nirmuktam kuśalam yānti paṇḍitāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ jñānaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca te kule mahati sthitāḥ // Dhs_34.18 //
analyzed: yeṣām jñānam ca śīlam ca te kule mahati sthitāḥ
caritum ca amalam śīlam śīlam eva mahā adbhutam
mahā kula prasūtāḥ te paṇḍitāḥ
vaśa māninaḥ
dāna śīla tapaḥ dhyāna satya aiśvarya parākramaiḥ

original: saṃyuktā ye kulīnāste ye na dharmavivarjitāḥ // Dhs_34.20 //
analyzed: saṃyuktāḥ ye kulīnāḥ te ye na dharma vivarjitāḥ
na aiśvarya jñāna hīnasya na kulam nā api saṅgatiḥ

original: tasmātkulaṃ jñānamayaṃ jñānahīnaṃ na tat kulam // Dhs_34.21 //
analyzed: tasmāt kulam jñāna mayam jñāna hīnam na tat kulam
iti mitra vargaḥ catustriṃśaḥ
rāja avavāda vargaḥ
dhārmikaḥ rājā svarga yāti
bhuvam parijano paśyan dharma cārī jita indriyaḥ

original: sa rājā dhārmiko dhīmān svargalokopapattaye // Dhs_35.1 //
analyzed: sa rājā dhārmikaḥ dhīmān svarga loka upapattaye
kaḥ lobha nirmuktaḥ rājā

original: niyataṃ yaḥ karaṃ kāle dharmeṇa paribhujyate /
analyzed: niyatam yaḥ karam kāle dharmeṇa paribhujyate

original: sa rājā lobhanirmukto yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.2 //
analyzed: sa rājā lobha nirmuktaḥ yāmānām adhipaḥ bhavet
rājñaḥ svarūpam
kṣamāvān priya vākyaḥ yaḥ krodha harṣa ādi dhārakaḥ

original: sa mahīṃ pālayettvenāṃ loke hi śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // Dhs_35.3 //
analyzed: sa mahīm pālayet tu enām loke hi śreṣṭha tām gataḥ
apakṣapātinaḥ śraddhā mitreṇa ca vihanyate
sa rājanya sabhā jetā deva lokāya kalpyate

original: baddhadarśī mahātmā yo gurupūjaka eva ca /
analyzed: baddha darśī mahātmā yaḥ guru pūjakaḥ eva ca
a lolaḥ yaḥ dṛḍha matiḥ devānām antikam vrajet
pūrve yat pitṛbhiḥ dattam devān upadiśanti ca

original: na ca hiṃsati bhūtāni sa deveṣūpapadyate // Dhs_35.6 //
analyzed: na ca hiṃsati bhūtāni sa deveṣu upapadyate
dāna śīle sadā dakṣaḥ dharma vādī jita indriyaḥ

original: sa matvāryāṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ devalokaṃ mahīyate // Dhs_35.7 //
analyzed: sa matvā āryām mahīm kṛtsnām deva lokam mahīyate
na adhārmikam dhārayati dhārmikeṣu ca rakṣati
sa dharma śīla saṃśuddhaḥ devānām antikam vrajet

original: na strīṇāṃ vaśago rājā sādhūnāṃ ca vaset sadā /
analyzed: na strīṇām vaśagaḥ rājā sādhūnām ca vaset sadā
sa nirmala matiḥ dhīraḥ sura loka upapattaye

original: na sarvasya vacogrāhī priyaḥ sādhujanasya tu /
analyzed: na sarvasya vacaḥ grāhī priyaḥ sādhu janasya tu
saḥ mṛtaḥ tattva darśī iva na ākṛṣṭaḥ iva rohati
kaḥ yāmānām adhipaḥ
yaḥ dharma lobham āyāti draviṇam nā eva lapsyate
sa lobha mala nirmuktaḥ yāmānām adhipaḥ bhavet
na mithyā darśanena api strī tva darśana tatparaḥ

original: sa śuddha eva vimalo yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.12 //
analyzed: sa śuddhaḥ eva vimalaḥ yāmānām adhipaḥ bhavet
kaḥ rājā deva priyaḥ bhavati
prājñaḥ śīle sadā yuktaḥ dānena abhīkṣṇatām gataḥ

original: pravijitya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ pretya devapriyo bhavet // Dhs_35.13 //
analyzed: pravijitya mahīm kṛtsnām pretya deva priyaḥ bhavet

original: priyasya tu bhaved vākyaṃ stotrotsavakaraṃ param /
analyzed: priyasya tu bhavet vākyam stotra utsava karam param
āhlādayitvā vasudhām ante deva upapattaye
avisaṃvādakam vākyam yasya meruḥ iva acalam
satya sopānam āruhya devānām antike gataḥ

original: hrāsavṛddhī ca bhūtānāmakasmāt kurute hi yaḥ /
analyzed: hrāsa vṛddhī ca bhūtānām akasmāt kurute hi yaḥ

original: sa rājā vai paro devairdevaloke ca tiṣṭhati // Dhs_35.16 //
analyzed: sa rājā vai paraḥ devaiḥ deva loke ca tiṣṭhati
manuṣya antara tattva jñaḥ yaḥ vetti hi balābalam

original: sa dhībalābhyāṃ saṃyukto yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.17 //
analyzed: sa dhī balābhyām saṃyuktaḥ yāmānām adhipaḥ bhavet
traidhātuka padam yat ca ratna trayam iha ucyate

original: yastat pūjayate rājā sa deveṣūpajāyate // Dhs_35.18 //
analyzed: yaḥ tat pūjayate rājā sa deveṣu upajāyate

original: kālaṃ niyatadarśī yaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ /
analyzed: kālam niyata darśī yaḥ prajānām ca hite rataḥ
sarvatas bhadra kāntāraḥ devānām adhipaḥ smṛtaḥ
nindā mala vinirmuktaḥ saṅga doṣa vivarjitaḥ

original: jñānagocarasampūjyo niyataṃ deva eva saḥ // Dhs_35.20 //
analyzed: jñāna gocara sampūjyaḥ niyatam devaḥ eva saḥ
kaḥ svarga yāti
kausīdya doṣa rahitaḥ nityam dṛḍha parākramaḥ

original: nāśayitvā sa doṣaughān pretya svargeṣu jāyate // Dhs_35.21 //
analyzed: nāśayitvā sa doṣa oghān pretya svargeṣu jāyate
sat mitraiḥ parivāritaḥ rājā devādhipaḥ bhavati
hitāni yasya mitrāṇi karma kartṛṇi nityaśas

original: sa mitraiḥ samparivṛto nṛpo devādhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.22 //
analyzed: sa mitraiḥ samparivṛtaḥ nṛpaḥ devādhipaḥ bhavet
na anuseveta durvṛttān vāc kṣepeṇa ca varjitaḥ

original: sa sadyo viṣanirmuktaḥ surāṇāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.23 //
analyzed: sa sadyas viṣa nirmuktaḥ surāṇām adhipaḥ bhavet
krodha harṣa vighātāya na ca pāpeṣu rakṣyate
sa pāpa paṅka nidhautaḥ sura loka adhipaḥ sadā

original: na śaktaḥ pānabhojyeṣu saṃsaktastu śubhe sadā /
analyzed: na śaktaḥ pāna bhojyeṣu saṃsaktaḥ tu śubhe sadā
sa śuddha dharma sandarśī vibudhaḥ dhika tām vrajet
kaḥ padam uttamam prāpnoti
su cintitam cintayati yaḥ
dharmeṣu ca vartate

original: dharmodayena dṛṣṭena yathā yāti triviṣṭapam // Dhs_35.26 //
analyzed: dharma udayena dṛṣṭena yathā yāti triviṣṭapam
saṃsārāt dīrghasūtrāt yaḥ tvaritam dharmam ācaret
sa dīrghasūtra nirmuktaḥ prayāti padam uttamam
dharmeṇa prajā pālakaḥ svarga sukham yāti
dharmeṇa eva prajāḥ nityam prapālayati yaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: sa dhārmikaḥ praśastātmā suraloke mahīyate // Dhs_35.28 //
analyzed: sa dhārmikaḥ praśasta ātmā sura loke mahīyate
daśā ime kuśalāḥ dharmāḥ iha uktāḥ tattva darśinā

original: yaste prakurute dharmān sa surādhipatāṃ vrajet // Dhs_35.29 //
analyzed: yaḥ te prakurute dharmān sa sura adhipa tām vrajet
hetu pratyaya sandarśī mārga amārgau tathā eva ca
sa dṛṣṭi mala nirmuktaḥ vibudhaḥ dhika tām gataḥ
kīdṛśaiḥ guṇa yutaiḥ rājā devānām adhipaḥ bhavati

original: yo devatāṃ pūjayati yathā cāhni mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ devatām pūjayati yathā ca ahni mahīpatiḥ

original: sa devapūjito bhūyo devānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.31 //
analyzed: sa deva pūjitaḥ bhūyas devānām adhipaḥ bhavet
anāvilena manasā prasannaḥ ca adhidārakaḥ
sva sva dāraiḥ ca santuṣṭaḥ devānām adhipaḥ bhavet
kaḥ śīlavān
hīyate yaḥ na viṣayaiḥ sarva bāla apahāribhiḥ

original: sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ // Dhs_35.33 //
analyzed: sa śīlavān divam yāti nityam śīlena rakṣitaḥ
avidyā varjakān nityam sevate yaḥ su dhārmikān
saddharma cintakaḥ saukhyam kalpate sura saṃsadi
vyāpāraiḥ svastha cittaḥ yaḥ
pārṣada ālāpa hāribhiḥ

original: sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ // Dhs_35.35 //
analyzed: sa śīlavān divam yāti nityam śīlena rakṣitaḥ
saddharmī rājā eva vasudhā adhipatiḥ
sat vyāpārāt dharmam imam pālayan vasudhādhipaḥ

original: praśāsti ca mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.36 //
analyzed: praśāsti ca mahīm kṛtsnām yāmānām adhipaḥ bhavet
sat karma niratasya rājñaḥ śobhate
sat karma nirataḥ bhṛtyaḥ nṛpe sat guṇa śālini

original: jano nirmalatāṃ yāti śaraccandra ivāmbare // Dhs_35.37 //
analyzed: janaḥ nirmala tām yāti śarad candraḥ iva ambare
kaḥ rājā deva tulyaḥ bhavati
hetu lakṣya vidhi jñāḥ ye aviruddhāḥ parasparam
samyak svāmi artha karttāraḥ devānām vaśam āgatāḥ
iti rāja avavāda vargaḥ pañcatriṃśaḥ
stuti vargaḥ
buddha stutiḥ
sama sattva agra vedāya sarva sattveṣu bandhave
sat mārga sārthavāhāya bhava bandhana bhedine
nānā dṛṣṭi vibhedāya sarva saṃśaya mocine
samyak dṛṣṭi niveśāya namaḥ sañjñānacakṣuṣe
sarva saṅkaṭa bhedāya tridoṣa mala śodhine
namaḥ nakṣatra bhūtāya sarva bīja phaloruhe
sarva prajñākara agrāya sarva dhyāna agra vedine
sarva ratna uttama āryāya namaḥ lāna agra darśine
iyam sā loka nāśasya viprayuktasya tāpinaḥ
pratimā dṛśyate śāntā mokṣam udghāṭya kārikā
samarcati imām nityam yaḥ
puruṣaḥ śānta mānasaḥ
sa mucyate bhava bhayāt nivṛttim ca adhigacchati
etat śānta padam ramyam etat naiṣṭhikam ucyate
yat ayam bhāṣate dharma nirvāṇa pura deśikaḥ
asya vākyam samālambya puruṣa adhīna vikramāḥ
ākarṣanti padam nityam yat ananta sukha āvaham
puruṣāḥ tattva cintakāḥ
triloka ogha arṇavam ghoram taranti bhava sāgaram
ayam sa cakṣuḥ lokasya samantāt hi vicakṣuṣaḥ
ayam jyotiḥ param jyotiḥ yat jyotiḥ kāṣṭha sambhavam
kalpa antam prāṇinām citte nṛṇām rāga ādibhiḥ malaiḥ
jñāna toyena mahatā śodhayati eva vāc nṛpaḥ
yat na dṛṣṭam padam sarvaiḥ tīrthikaiḥ jñāna pāṇibhiḥ
tat padam vimalaiḥ vākyaiḥ tvayā nṛṇām pradarśitam
pramāda paramaḥ nāthaḥ janaḥ yam tāritaḥ tvayā
tīrṇaḥ pāra gataḥ nāthaḥ tārayati agha nāśanāt
hita artha sarva jagataḥ tvam eva ekaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
ahitānām hitāya eva tvam eva puruṣottamaḥ
anādimati saṃsāre nṛṇām kleśa apahārakaiḥ

original: tvayā viśodhito vākyaistamaḥ sūryodaye yathā // Dhs_36.15 //
analyzed: tvayā viśodhitaḥ vākyaiḥ tamaḥ sūrya udaye yathā
akṣayaḥ sarva dharmāṇām jñāna loka karaḥ mahān
tvam eva ekaḥ jagannātha lokottara guṇa arṇavaḥ
iti stuti vargaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ
puṇya deva sukhaiḥ mitrarāja stutibhiḥ anvitāḥ
saddharma smṛti vaipulyai gṛhītaḥ yam samuccayaḥ
iti caturtham udānam

original: ye ca dharmā hetubhavā teṣāṃ tathāgato 'vadat /
analyzed: ye ca dharmāḥ hetu bhavā teṣām tathāgataḥ vadat
teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ ca evaṃvādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
puṇyam avāpta mantra kleśam vibhidya ajana valā śrīkam
yāvat jagat vyākulam tarka niṣṭhaiḥ samākulam vetti satya vacanaiḥ
vaipulya mahā gambhīra udadhi sūtra varāt bhikṣuṇā
avalokita siṃhena uddhṛtam iti

original: mohāśivādirahitasya vākyavidyasya vipulārjanasya 'dharmasamuccayo' nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ samāptaḥ /
analyzed: moha aśiva ādi rahitasya vākya vidyasya vipulārjanasya dharmasamuccayaḥ nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
iti śubham
